title: India Yamaha Motor recalls 3 lakh scooter units to rectify brake parts
description: India Yamaha Motor is recalling approximately 300,000 units of its 125 cc scooter models Ray ZR 125 Fi Hybrid and Fascino 125 Fi Hybrid due to faulty brake parts. The recall applies to scooters manufactured between January 1, 2022, and January 4, 2024. Yamaha is providing free replacement parts to affected customers and has urged them to check their eligibility for the recall on the company's website or visit a Yamaha service center for assistance.
